general.name: IT-Glue Automatic Documentation - Local Administrator Passwords [WIN]
general.description: An alternative to LAPS for MSPs. resets and uploads local administrator password to IT-Glue. Minimum Required OS: Server 2012 R2+, PS 5.0+ Related blog: https://www.cyberdrain.com/documenting-with-powershell-chapter-3-local-administrator-passwords-solution/

variable.name: NewAdminUserName
variable.description: Only used when ChangeAdminUser is set to true. Enter the new administrator name.

variable.name: ChangeAdminUsername
variable.description: Change the current administrators username(Disable "Administrator" and creates new account)
